column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hou - Ting says : " When is the Avatar scheduled for delivery ? "
#Text=Gun says : " The airship already left Fort Bosco and should be arriving in a few hours . "
#Text=Hou - Ting says : " Excellent .
#Text=But first there are some ... people here who captured two of the Avatar 's friends .
#Text=They would like to present them to you personally .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " You know I do n't meet with bounty hunters .
#Text=" Gun says : " And of course I told them that .
#Text=But they say they have some information that might interest you ; about the location of your stolen airbenders .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Really ?
#Text=Fine , send them in .
#Text=Ah , yes , I remember these two .
#Text=We 'll find an acceptable home for you in prison , with the rest of the dissidents .
#Text=Now , I 'm told you have some information for me .
#Text=I hope this is n't just some ruse to increase your bounty .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " We do n't want any bounty , Your Majesty .
#Text=You can consider these two a " thank you " gift for simply taking the time to talk to us .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " How very magnanimous .
#Text=So , where are my airbenders ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I 'd be happy to tell you , once you hand the Avatar over to me .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Who told you that we have the Avatar ?!
#Text=" Zaheer says : " How I know is not important .
#Text=But if I found out , others will too .
#Text=And that could put you in a difficult position .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Is that so ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Your Majesty , imprisoning the Avatar will cause the other nations to turn against you and demand her freedom .
#Text=Before long , we 'd be in the midst of a sticky international incident .
#Text=If you let me take her today , no one need ever know she was here , and you can get your airbenders back without interference .
#Text=We both win .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " And what do you plan to do with the Avatar should I see fit to grant your request .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " All I can say is : I have business with her .
#Text=But she wo n't be bothering you again .
#Text=I can assure you of that .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " I find these terms agreeable .
#Text=Gun , escort them to the antechamber until the Avatar 's arrival .
#Text=Send these two to the dungeon .
#Text="
